settings.title: Product Description
settings.content:
Introducing the Immunity & Energy Multivitamin by ActiveCare - the elite performance supplement for anyone looking to optimize their levels of whole body health and circadian rhythm for healthy aging. Our bespoke blend of micronutrients, probiotics, digestive enzymes, and botanical terpenes is custom-made for those who want to support their mental, physical and nutritional goals.

Whether you're striving for peak performance or just want to give yourself the edge in your daily life, this next-generation multivitamin can help take you wherever you need to go. With its potent blend of natural ingredients to support your bodies needs or break down your day-to-day macro and micro nutrients, this is the gummy for you!

This multivitamin can help promote essential functions like immune support and energy production while stimulating healthy inflammatory pathways. The results? Improved mental clarity, enhanced physical productivity, increased nutrient absorption—basically everything you need to push your body into high gear.

Skip the endless search for high quality ingredients that aren't always easy to find; instead choose the Immunity & Energy Multivitamin by ActiveCare, a decision made easy! Reach a higher level of health and well-being with this boss mode multivitamin today.

settings.title: Benefits
settings.content:
+ Targets Whole Body Health & Daytime Circadian Rhythm

+ Helps Absorbs vital day-to-day macro and micro nutrients

+Contains vital nutrients essential for normal bodily function.

+ Fights free radicals in the body, and promotes cell division, growth, reproduction, and vision.

+ Promotes good immune health, cellular recovery, and bone health.

+ Assists the immune system, helps maintain calcium and phosphorus balance, and balances insulin levels.

+ Promotes healthy brain, skin, and blood, and contains antioxidant properties.

+ Boosts energy levels and improves signs of aging.

+ Provides essential nutrients that support red blood cell growth, energy levels, digestion, nerve function, eyesight, cognitive function, hormone production, healthy muscle tone, and cardiovascular health.

+ Provides calcium citrate for bone health, iron for hemoglobin and myoglobin production, zinc for cell growth, magnesium malate for blood sugar control and skin health, and potassium for normal blood pressure and fluid levels.

+ Contains other beneficial nutrients, such as citric acid for reducing urine acid levels and killing bacteria, probiotics for maintaining a healthy gut and supporting the immune system, digestive enzymes for promoting healthy digestion, and plant adaptogens for overall health & wellness.

settings.title: How it works
settings.content:
Taking vitamins correctly can be a significant factor in ensuring their effectiveness. Our Immunity & Energy Gummies are easy to incorporate into your daily routine. We recommend taking one gummy daily, either at or around the time of a meal or snack, to ensure optimal absorption.

Taking the gummies with a meal or snack containing some fat can naturally support the absorption of the essential fat-soluble vitamins in our product. By doing so, your body can utilize the nutrients more efficiently, resulting in maximum benefits.

It's essential to follow the recommended dosage and only exceed it if your healthcare practitioner advises. Taking more than the recommended dosage can result in adverse effects, including potential toxicity.

It's also crucial to keep our Immunity & Energy Gummies out of reach of children. While our product is safe and designed for adults, children's bodies may not be able to handle the vitamins' dosage effectively. Keeping the product away from children will ensure their safety.

Finally, storing our gummies in a cool, dry place without direct sunlight is essential. Storing them in such conditions will prevent any deterioration or spoilage of the product, ensuring their efficacy and quality are maintained.

settings.text_cont: Thiamine plays an important role in converting carbohydrates into energy. Without thiamine, the nervous system can’t function and everyday abilities like walking, cognition and speech are impaired
settings.text_contpro: Thiamine plays an important role in converting carbohydrates into energy.

settings.text_cont: Riboflavin works to reduce oxidative stress and inflammation of nerves, which are contributors to migraine headaches.
Niacin (vitamin B-3) is often part of a daily multivitamin, but most people get enough niacin from the food they eat.
settings.text_contpro: Foods rich in niacin include yeast, milk, meat, tortillas and cereal grains.

settings.text_cont: In addition to playing a role in the breakdown of fats and carbohydrates for energy
Vitamin B-6 (pyridoxine) is important for normal brain development and for keeping the nervous system and immune system healthy.
Folate (vitamin B-9) is important in red blood cell formation and for healthy cell growth and function.
Vitamin B12, or cobalamin, is naturally found in animal foods. It can also be added to foods or supplements.
Vitamin A, also known as retinol, has several important functions.
Vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant that supports immune function, collagen production, and wound healing.
Vitamin D3 is best known for strengthening your bones, which it does by helping the body absorb calcium and phosphorus from food
Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant that helps protect cells from damage, supports immune function, and promotes healthy skin.
CoQ10 is an important antioxidant that supports energy production, heart health, and immune function.

settings.question: How does targeting Whole Body Health & Circadian Rhythm support my overall well-being ?
settings.answer:
In our fast-paced world, factors like stress, traveling, environmental changes, and unhealthy diets can impact our overall well-being and how we age. Embracing whole body health and aligning with our natural circadian rhythms is crucial for a vibrant and balanced life.

Imagine your body as a thriving, interconnected ecosystem made up of trillions of enzymes, microorganisms, and fungi. Nourishing this complex network with essential nutrients, beneficial bacteria, digestive enzymes, and natural adaptogens promotes comprehensive health and well-being from within.

By aligning your body's internal ecosystem with your circadian rhythms, you promote holistic wellness that lays the foundation for a strong, resilient, and balanced life.

settings.question: Are these gummies clinically-studied?
settings.answer:
ActiveCare’s Gummies are formulated with a clinically-studied DigeZyme® for its enhanced absorption of minerals and vitamins, decreased pain and tenderness associated by exercising and a declining trend in the level of pro-inflammatory biomarkers.

Furthermore, our gummies also use a clinically validated and commercial  probiotic, Lactorspore® containing L(+) lactic acid producing microbial preparation from Bacillus coagulans, MTCC 5856 (also  known to be Lactobacillus sporogenes). demonstrated  for its supportive role in managing the immune system, irritable bowel syndrome, weight management and even cholesterol management

settings.question: Are all-natural vitamin gummies better than other vitamin supplements?
settings.answer:
It depends on individual preferences and needs. All-natural vitamin gummies can be a good option for those who prefer to avoid artificial ingredients or have dietary restrictions. However, choosing a high-quality product that contains the necessary vitamins and minerals and meets your specific needs is important.

ActiveCare Gummies are made using all-natural vegan ingredients that are organically sourced, contain NO GMO’s, Gluten, Soy, Artificial Coloring, Gelatin or other harmful ingredients.

settings.question: What Are Digestive Enzymes?
settings.answer:
The food you eat needs to be broken down by digestive enzymes. These proteins accelerate the chemical processes that transform food into compounds that can be absorbed by your digestive system.

There are digesting enzymes in your saliva. They are also expelled by a few of your organs, such as the gallbladder, liver, and pancreas. Digestive enzymes are also kept in cells that line the outside of your intestines.

However, you can also add digestive enzymes into your diet if you need to improve your body's performance, digestion, and recovery. All our ActiveCare products follow a multi-enzyme approach that ensures superior absorption of vital macro and micro nutrients in your body and throughout your daily diet.

settings.question: How do you source your ingredients?
settings.answer: All ingredients are organically sourced from food with a focus on bioavailability and bio-accessibility. Every ingredient and product goes through comprehensive 3rd party testing and are Vegan, Non-GMO, Soy Free, Dairy Free, Gelatin-Free and Proudly Manufactured in our USA Facility, which is FDA Registered, NSF, ISO & GMP Certified.

settings.question: Is ActiveCare Gummies tested for heavy metals?
settings.answer: Yes! Every batch of our gummies is rigorously tested for heavy metals – once at the time of manufacturing and again when it's packaged.

settings.question: What is the best way to take my ActiveCare gummies?
settings.answer:
We recommend you take one gummy either at or around the time of a meal or snack to ensure optimal absorption. By taking the gummies with some food containing fat, your body can naturally support the absorption of essential fat-soluble vitamins in our product, allowing you to enjoy maximum benefits; however, it is not mandatory. 

It's essential to follow the recommended dosage and only exceed it if your healthcare practitioner advises. 

Taking more than the recommended dosage can result in adverse effects, including potential toxicity.

It is important to consult with your healthcare professional prior to use if you are taking any medications, have any medical conditions or are allergic to any of the listed ingredients.

settings.question: What if I have an issue with my order?
settings.answer:
Sometimes, if an order is exposed to hot temperatures or a long period of time during transit, it may arrive partially thawed.

If your order is delayed 5 days or more and has thawed, you can quickly put them in the refrigerator to reform their shape or contact hello@activecarenutrition.com, and one of our customer service representatives can help resolve the issue.  

It’s important these gummies are kept in a cool, dry place and resealed full after use. All gummies can melt at a temperature of 95 degrees or  more.
